text: Herod, otai'noŏsax mokŏk'ietappix otap'apĭstotoyĭsax, eks'kaiĭstsetŭkkiu, ki itŭp'otokŏttsiuax (otsen'nakemix) Bethlehem ki sa'akapotsim, ai'stokistuyimix sŏk'umappix ikŏn'ainĭttsiauax; kŭttaistoki'stuyimix sŏk'umappix mat'okŏnainittsiauax, umut'otsksĭnippi otsokap'sŭppoŏtsesattŭsax mokŏk'ietappix.
